app.description: Mark PCR reads to their PCR amplicon https://www.biostars.org/p/149687/

option.name: clip_reads
option.description: clip read to their PCR fragments. see https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/PcrClipReads

option.name: bedFile
option.description: bed file containing non-overlapping PCR fragments.

option.name: ambiguityStrategyStr
option.description: if a read is mapped on multiple PCR fragments, how to resolve ambiguity ? random : choose a random fragment zero : set MAPQ to zero and ignore. closer : choose PCR fragment closest to NGS-fragment boundaries.
